newScenarioName.title: newScenarioName
newScenarioName.description: The name of new scenario. This will be provided by user as a result of a previous Action. Use that value.

scenarioId.title: scenarioId
scenarioId.description: This will be a user input. Agent will be asking user to select a base scenario from a list of scenarios. When user selects an option from the list, use that as this input value
